pages.text: A Snow Covered Rock looks like a snowball, is thrown like a snowball, however unlike a snowball, it does damage to everyone. One bad hit to the head may induce some nasty side effects for a short time.
Snowier Snowballs always inflict Slowness and are more effective than their normal counterparts against Blazes. They can also freeze water, and turn lava to obsidian.
Lightning snowballs carry a Lightning Transposer on them. When they land, the transposer will activate, striking the target with lightning
